femgen model.__description__: Data model representing the data from Morphosense Neuron system

__properties__.name: time
__properties__.description: Unix Timestamp seconds since 1. January 1970 00:00:00 UTC - Representing date and hour of recording

__properties__.name: time_psd
__properties__.description: Unix Timestamp seconds since 1. January 1970 00:00:00 UTC - Representing date and hour of recording for PSD specifically

__properties__.name: Frequency_psd
__properties__.description: Frequency for Power Spectral Density

__properties__.name: status_Neuron_Sensors
__properties__.description: Neuron sensors Status description for each hour representing the next step in the process (Fetch/Allocate/waiting_merge/Done |Error).
